abstract: Wells Fargo has told potential suitors that Evergreen Investments , the asset management unit it inherited when it bought Wachovia, is not for sale, The New York Post reported, citing undisclosed sources.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo has told potential suitors that Evergreen Investments , the asset management unit it inherited when it bought Wachovia, is not for sale, The New York Post reported, citing undisclosed sources.

headline.main: Wells Fargo May Keep Evergreen Investments, Report Says

abstract: Wells Fargo said Thursday that it is likely to report a bigger-than-expected profit of about $3 billion for the first quarter, offering an early look at its financial results ahead of the highly anticipated earnings season for the nation’s banks.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo said Thursday that it is likely to report a bigger-than-expected profit of about $3 billion for the first quarter, offering an early look at its financial results ahead of the highly anticipated earnings season for the nation’s banks.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Expects $3 Billion Profit in First Quarter

abstract: The sudden turnaround has investors wondering if the markets have bottomed out or if larger problems are being ignored.
snippet: The sudden turnaround has investors wondering if the markets have bottomed out or if larger problems are being ignored.
lead_paragraph: Stock markets surged higher on Thursday after Wells Fargo, the nation’s largest consumer bank, said that it expected to report record profit for the first three months of the year, kindling hopes that financial companies may finally be closing the book on quarter after quarter of wrenching losses.

headline.main: As Stocks Surge, Fears Linger About the Economy
headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo Gives Wall Street a Reason to Buy

byline.original: By Jack Healy and Eric Dash

abstract: All it took to lift bank stocks was a little announcement from Wells Fargo — granted, it was a forecast of about $3 billion in first-quarter profit.
lead_paragraph: All it took to lift bank stocks was a little announcement from Wells Fargo — granted, it was a forecast of about $3 billion in first-quarter profit.

headline.main: Bank Stocks Rise on Wells Fargo’s Forecast
